body:
Select  Distinct OS.OdemeSekliID, OS.OdemeSekliKodu, OS.OdemeSekliAdi, 'SATIŞ' Tur
From    PV04_UTSiparisAnaliz_DHamKumas_Tum USADHKT
        Inner Join IT01_OdemeSekilleri OS On OS.OdemeSekliID = USADHKT.OdemeSekliID
Where   USADHKT.DurumKodu = 'AÇIK'
Union 
Select Distinct OS.OdemeSekliID, OS.OdemeSekliKodu, OS.OdemeSekliAdi, 'SATIN ALMA' Tur From PV12_SiparisAnaliz_Onayli SAO
INNER JOIN IT01_OdemeSekilleri OS On OS.OdemeSekliID = SAO.OdemeSekliID
Order By  OS.OdemeSekliKodu
Go

Select  Distinct USADHKT.FirmaId, USADHKT.FirmaKodu, USADHKT.FirmaAdi, 'SİPARİŞ' Tur
From    PV04_UTSiparisAnaliz_DHamKumas_Tum USADHKT
        Inner Join IT01_OdemeSekilleri OS On OS.OdemeSekliID = USADHKT.OdemeSekliID
Where   USADHKT.DurumKodu = 'AÇIK'
Union
Select  Distinct SAHKSI.FirmaId, SAHKSI.FirmaKodu,  SAHKSI.FirmaAdi, 'HK AMBAR' Tur From PV06_StokAmbarHamKumas_SeriID SAHKSI
Union 
Select Distinct SAO.firmaID, SAO.SipFirmaKodu, SAO.FirmaAdi, 'SATIN ALMA' Tur From PV12_SiparisAnaliz_Onayli SAO
Union
SELECT Distinct SAAMKSI.FirmaId, SAAMKSI.FirmaKodu,  SAAMKSI.FirmaAdi, 'MK AMBAR' Tur  FROM PV06_StokAnaAmbarMamulKumas_SeriID SAAMKSI 
Order By  USADHKT.FirmaAdi
Go



Select Distinct SAO.SDMDurumu, SAO.SipFirmaKodu From PV12_SiparisAnaliz_Onayli SAO 

Select  Distinct OS.OdemeSekliKodu, OS.OdemeSekliAdi, OS.OdemeSekliID
From    PV04_UTSiparisAnaliz_DHamKumas_Tum USADHKT
        Inner Join IT01_OdemeSekilleri OS On OS.OdemeSekliID = USADHKT.OdemeSekliID
Where   USADHKT.DurumKodu = 'AÇIK'


Select  *
From    IT01_OdemeSekilleri OS
Where   OS.OdemeSekliID Not In(Select   Distinct OS.OdemeSekliID
                               From     PV04_UTSiparisAnaliz_DHamKumas_Tum USADHKT
                                        Inner Join IT01_OdemeSekilleri OS On OS.OdemeSekliID = USADHKT.OdemeSekliID
                               Where    USADHKT.DurumKodu = 'AÇIK')

Select F.Aktif, * FROM IT01_Firmalar F
Go
Select OS.Aktif, * FROM IT01_OdemeSekilleri OS
Go

Select S.ITObjectID, OM.ITObjectName, * FROM IT15_Screens S 
INNER JOIN IT15_ObjectsM OM On OM.ITObjectID = S.ITObjectID
Where S.ModulAltGrupID = 87

SELECT Distinct SAHKSI.FirmaKodu FROM PV06_StokAmbarHamKumas_SeriID SAHKSI
